Kanshudo_mnemonic: one wavy river working (巠) makes your effort (力) strong
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Powerful toilet paper has the power to not irritate the muscle and skin in that sensitive part of your body.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " force " and "巠", the original meaning is strong and powerful. "Shuowen": "Strong also. Work hard, cry out." "Sun Tzu-Jun Zheng": "If you fight for a hundred miles, you will capture the three generals. Those who are strong come first, those who are tired are second."

" Jin " can mean strong and strong. "Han Feizi-Lonely Indignation": "A person who can law will be strong and straightforward."

" Jin " also means strong power. "Warring States Policy‧Han Ceyi": "The husband uses the power of Han, and the wise man of the king, wants to serve the Qin in the west, and is called the East Fan... The husband is ashamed of the society and laughs for the world. There is no such thing as this."

" Jin " also means that the wind is strong. Southern Song Xie Lingyun's "Twilight": "The bright moon shines on the snow, the wind is strong and sad."

" Jin " also means the brushwork is strong . Song Jiangkui (Continued Book Score): "However, it is true to turn around and stay behind. It is necessary to know the stamina of the grass."

" Jin " can also mean strengthening. "Historical Records: The Family of Chu": "Splitting the land is not enough to fatten the country, and gaining all is not enough to make soldiers."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " force " and "巠", the original meaning is strong and powerful.
humanum_full_description:
從「力」，「巠」聲，本義為強健有力。《說文》：「彊也。从力，巠聲。」《孫子‧軍爭》：「百里而爭利，則擒三將軍。勁者先，疲者後。」

　　「勁」可表示堅強、剛強。《韓非子‧孤憤》：「能法之士，必強毅而勁直。」

　　「勁」也表示勢力強大。《戰國策‧韓策一》：「夫以韓之勁，與大王之賢，乃欲西面事秦，稱東藩……夫羞社稷而為天下笑，無過此者矣。」

　　「勁」還表示風勢強勁。南朝宋謝靈運〈歲暮〉：「明月照積雪，朔風勁且哀。」

　　「勁」亦表示筆法遒勁。宋姜夔〈續書譜〉：「然而真以轉而後遒，草以折而後勁，不可不知也。」

　　「勁」還能指加強。《史記‧楚世家》：「裂其地不足以肥國，得其眾不足以勁兵。」
humanum_short_description: 從「力」，「巠」聲，本義為強健有力。

從「 力 」，「 巠 」聲，本義為強健有力。《說文》：「彊也。从力，巠聲。」《孫子‧軍爭》：「百里而爭利，則擒三將軍。勁者先，疲者後。」 「 勁 」可表示堅強、剛強。《韓非子‧孤憤》：「能法之士，必強毅而勁直。」 「 勁 」也表示勢力強大。《戰國策‧韓策一》：「夫以韓之勁，與大王之賢，乃欲西面事秦，稱東藩……夫羞社稷而為天下笑，無過此者矣。」 「 勁 」還表示風勢強勁。南朝宋謝靈運〈歲暮〉：「明月照積雪，朔風勁且哀。」 「 勁 」亦表示筆法遒勁。宋姜夔〈續書譜〉：「然而真以轉而後遒，草以折而後勁，不可不知也。」 「 勁 」還能指加強。《史記‧楚世家》：「裂其地不足以肥國，得其眾不足以勁兵。」
From the sound of " force" and " 巠", the original meaning is strong and powerful. "Shuowen": "Strong also. Work hard, cry out." "Sun Tzu-Jun Zheng": "If you fight for a hundred miles, you will capture the three generals. Those who are strong come first, those who are tired are second." " Jin" can mean strong and strong. "Han Feizi-Lonely Indignation": "A person who can law will be strong and straightforward." " Jin" also means strong power. "Warring States Policy‧Han Ceyi": "The husband uses the power of Han, and the wise man of the king, wants to serve the Qin in the west, and is called the East Fan... The husband is ashamed of the society and laughs for the world. There is no such thing as this." " Jin" also means that the wind is strong. Southern Song Xie Lingyun's "Twilight": "The bright moon shines on the snow, the wind is strong and sad." " Jin" also means the brushwork is strong. Song Jiangkui (Continued Book Score): "However, it is true to turn around and stay behind. It is necessary to know the stamina of the grass." " Jin" can also mean strengthening. "Historical Records: The Family of Chu": "Splitting the land is not enough to fatten the country, and gaining all is not enough to make soldiers."

勁字的基本解释

勁
jìn

勁
jìng
均见“劲”。

勁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《廣韻》居正切，去勁，見。］
亦作“劤1”。“劲1”的繁体字。
(1)强健有力。
(2)战斗力强。
(3)势力强大。
(4)风势强劲。
(5)笔法遒劲。
(6)刚强。
(7)坚固，坚硬。
(8)加强。
[②]［jìn］
亦作“劤2”。“劲2”的繁体字。
(1)力量，力气。
(2)神态；情绪。
(3)样子。
(4)趣味；兴趣。
(5)指某种程度，限度。

勁字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　勁； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页147第25
【唐韻】居正切【集韻】【韻會】堅正切【正韻】居慶切，?頸去聲。【說文】强也。从力，巠聲。【廣韻】健也。【增韻】堅也，遒也。【左傳·宣十二年】中權後勁。又【正韻】亦作繕。【禮·曲禮】急繕其怒。

勁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
勁字的起名意思

暂无。
